channel.title: How to become owner on 508 server
channel.description:
Hey guys, I was wondering how to become owner on my 508 server. Thing is, i'm admin with p.rights = 2; but in game it shows me up as Admin.
And everyone blabs around asking for the owner? Plus theirs extra commands for the owner in the source im using.
So can you guys please help ASAP?

item.title: How to become owner on 508 server
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

Basicly what he said.

[quote=“Shadow1442, post:2, topic:382141”]There is no Owner right in 508. There is only Upto Admin. but you can go over rights 2, but it will have no crown in public chat
but in PM’s it does. So i suppose it Hidden Admin. Just put your name in yell and players as Title “Main Owner” and Make yourself
Donator, If your source has it.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: How to become owner on 508 server

item.title: How to become owner on 508 server
item.dc:creator: @Shadow1442 Shadow1442
item.description:
@Shadow1442 wrote:

There is no Owner right in 508. There is only Upto Admin. but you can go over rights 2, but it will have no crown in public chat
but in PM’s it does. So i suppose it Hidden Admin. Just put your name in yell and players as Title “Main Owner” and Make yourself
Donator, If your source has it.

Read full topic
item.source: How to become owner on 508 server
